previews.title: Shift the overall look and feel by adding these wonderful touches to furniture in your home
previews.text: Ever been in a room and felt like something was missing? Perhaps it felt  slightly bare and uninviting. I’ve got some simple tips to help you make any room feel complete.
previews.author: Michelle Appleton
